text:
DoubleDutch | Senior Software Engineer (ONSITE) (Phoenix, AZ)

DoubleDutch is a market leader in event management software & solutions. Our Event CMS back end consists of services written in Go, C# ASP.NET, and Java. We utilize PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, ElasticSearch, and RabbitMQ.

Contact me at amcwatters@doubledutch.me to learn more.
